parameters.name: KeyWord
parameters.description: Keyword, defaults to all information if not specified

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: Number of items per page, default: 10

parameters.name: Status
parameters.description:
Delivery result. If not filled, it represents all statuses. Values:

- 0: Success

- 2: Invalid address

- 3: Spam

- 4: Failure
